_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2014 11:56:49 using v2.1
title: How has the proportion of staff who feel under pressure to attend work while ill changed over time?
analysis_commentary: A substantial proportion of NHS staff have felt under pressure to attend work when ill. The proportion increased from 21% in 2009 to 27% in 2012, before falling slightly to 25% in 2013. There is no data for 2014.
data_source: Department of Health, NHS Staff Survey
